array.string: Concavity - Curvature of a board across the width.
Deck - The wood part of a skateboard.
Flex - The stiffness of a deck.
Grip - Sand paper like material on deck.
Goofy - When a rider rides right foot forward.
Heel - The edge of the board where a rider's heel is.
Kick - Where the deck curves upward.
Length - How long a board is from nose to tail.
Nose - The front of a board.
Regular - When a rider rides left foot forward.
Wheel Durometer - The hardness/softness of the wheels.
Width - How wide a board is from heel to toe.
Tail - Back end of a board.
Toe -The edge of the board where a rider's toe is.
